## DateTimePickerComponent class

Component used for displaying date time picker

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class DateTimePickerComponent<TDate = any> implements OnInit, OnDestroy 
```
<b>Implements:</b> OnInit, OnDestroy
